articles.author: Sriram Iyer, executive editor, CNBC-TV18
articles.title: India isn’t flinching: Why Trump might be misreading India’s tariff playbook - CNBC
articles.description: Washington may be mistaking India's complaisance for America's leverage.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi hold a joint press conference in the East Room of the White House in Washington, DC, on February 13, 2025.
